channel.title: Nomsters Podcast
channel.googleplay:author: Nomsters
channel.itunes:author: Nomsters
channel.description: There's nothing better in this world than the sloppy mess of a good burger. Us nomsters have sacrificed our arteries for the greatest good of finding the best burger in the world (by world we mostly mean NYC). What started out a Burger Tour around NYC, branched out to all different kinds of foods with many other moonlighting, food crazy, Nomsters ready to commit Nomstrosities. Join Ben, Darius, and Mike to hear about their delicious adventures, discussions on food tech and food trends, and frequent bad jokes.

item.title: Burgers, Bacon, and Wine Bars?
item.description: Join Ben, Darius, and Mike in the inaugural Nomsters podcast. They discuss the origins of Nomsters (spoilers: too much bacon), and their favorite wine bar?

item.title: Closed Down Restaurants feat. Impossible Whopper
item.description: Join Ben, Darius, and Mike as they discuss their favorite closed down restaurants. Special shoutout to Burger King for potentially going that route too?

item.title: Who Wants Pizza from Last Night?
item.description: Join Ben, Darius, and Mike as they discuss some extremely weird new food trends and questionable life choices
